title: Amazon Web Services Suffers Brief Outage
sub_head: AWS issues arise again after hourslong outage last week disrupted service across internet
body:
Amazon.com Inc . â€™s cloud-computing unit suffered a brief outage Wednesday, stoking fears of a repeat of the hourslong outage last week that caused much of the internet to stop working.
This time around, Amazon said on its site Wednesday that it identified issues in Oregon and Northern California after 10:43 a.m. ET and fixed both problems in less than 30 minutes.
